channel.title: Allows user to search by location to view SAV in the interactive map on Climate Tools
channel.description: Recent content in Allows user to search by location to view SAV in the interactive map on Climate Tools

item.title: Submerged Aquatic Vegetation (SAV) in the Chesapeake Bay
item.description: Developed By: VIMS Summary: The Submerged Aquatic Vegetation (SAV) in Chesapeake Bay tool provides access to recent and historical SAV monitoring data from the Virginia Institute of Marine Science SAV program.
